text: "Dream Police" is a 1979 song by Cheap Track and is the title track from their fourth studio album Dream Police. It went to number 26 in the United States, number 79 in Japan, number 37 in the Netherlands, number 7 in New Zealand, number 9 in Canada and number 5 in Australia. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Cheap Trick songs
title: Dream Police (song)
